sourcesContent: import t,{useRef as r,useImperativeHandle as e}from"react";import{useTableContext as o}from"./table-context";import{StyledTableFooter as l}from"./table.styles";import a from"../utils/clsx";import{jsx as i}from"react/jsx-runtime";const n=t.forwardRef((({children:t,...n},s)=>{const m=r(null);e(s,(()=>null==m?void 0:m.current));const{footerAlign:c}=o();return i(l,{ref:m,role:"rowgroup",align:n.align||c,className:a("nextui-table-footer",n.className),...n,children:t})}));n.displayName="NextUI.TableFooter",n.toString=()=>".nextui-table-footer";export default n;
